results.name: Spider-Man
results.description: Bitten by a radioactive spider, Peter Parker now has spider-like abilities.

results.name: Iron Man
results.description: Genius. Billionaire. Philanthropist. Tony Stark builds a high-tech suit to save his own life and then others.

results.name: Captain America
results.description: Recipient of the Super-Soldier serum, World War II hero Steve Rogers fights for American ideals as one of the world's mightiest heroes.

results.name: Thor
results.description: Recipient of the Super-Soldier serum, World War II hero Steve Rogers fights for American ideals as one of the world's mightiest heroes.
